#Abstract

Here, we examine the cool life expectancy plot. 

```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
```

We will first clean the data. 


```{r}
gapminder %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp)) %>%
  select(country, lifeExp, year) %>%
  arrange(year) ->
  sumdat
```


We will now recreate the plot from Oeppen and Vaulpel(2002). 

```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(lifeExp > 28)
```
